boost/python/eigen/return_internal_matrix.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_RETURN_INTERNAL_MATRIX_HPP_INCLUDED
00002 #define BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_RETURN_INTERNAL_MATRIX_HPP_INCLUDED
00003 
00004 #include <boost/numpy.hpp>
00005 #include <Eigen/Core>
00006 
00007 namespace boost { namespace python {
00008 
00009 template <std::size_t owner_arg = 1, typename Base = default_call_policies>
00010 struct return_internal_matrix : public Base {
00011 
00020     template <typename Matrix, bool writeable>
00021     struct make_shallow_matrix {
00022 
00023         inline bool convertible() const {
00024             return eigen_to_python<Matrix>::shallow_possible;
00025         }
00026 
00027         inline PyObject * operator()(Matrix const & x) const {
00028             try {
00029                 object r = eigen_to_python< Matrix >::to_python_shallow(x, object(), writeable);
00030                 Py_INCREF(r.ptr());
00031                 return r.ptr();
00032             } catch (error_already_set & exc) {
00033                 handle_exception();
00034                 return NULL;
00035             }
00036         }
00037 
00038         inline PyTypeObject const * get_pytype() const {
00039             return converter::object_manager_traits<numpy::matrix>::get_pytype();
00040         }
00041 
00042     };
00043 
00045     struct result_converter {
00046         template <typename T>
00047         struct apply {
00048             typedef typename boost::remove_reference<T>::type dereferenced;
00049             
00050             typedef make_shallow_matrix<
00051                 typename boost::remove_const<dereferenced>::type,
00052                 boost::is_const<dereferenced>::value
00053                 > type;
00054         };
00055     };
00056 
00057     template <typename ArgumentPackage>
00058     static PyObject * postcall(ArgumentPackage const & args_, PyObject * result) {
00059         std::size_t arity_ = detail::arity(args_);
00060         if (owner_arg > arity_ || owner_arg < 1) {
00061             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_IndexError,
00062                             "boost::python::return_internal_matrix: argument out of range.");
00063             return NULL;
00064         }
00065         PyObject * owner_ref = detail::get_prev<owner_arg>::execute(args_, result);
00066         if (owner_ref == NULL) return 0;
00067         result = Base::postcall(args_, result);
00068         if (result == NULL) return 0;
00069         try {
00070             object owner(reinterpret_cast<python::detail::borrowed_reference>(owner_ref));
00071             numpy::ndarray array(reinterpret_cast<python::detail::borrowed_reference>(result));
00072             array.set_base(owner);
00073             Py_INCREF(array.ptr());
00074             result = array.ptr();
00075         } catch (error_already_set & err) {
00076             handle_exception();
00077             return NULL;
00078         }
00079         return result;
00080     }
00081 };
00082 
00083 }} // namespace boost::python
